topic.title: How to Fix Text Bleeding From Table Cells

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: Slim tables or tables that have many columns make the text from the cells be confined to a small horizontal space. Sometimes this causes long words to bleed outside the cell boundaries.
By default, the built-in CSS automatically activates the hyphenation for the text inside tables as long as your topics have the language specified.
